topics.body:
You know; going back to what I said about synthetic organisms and such thinking upon that with our own world android girlfriends are far more likely than skynet or AM.

To recap of what I have said previously whenever this topic comes up:
1)Traditional transistors suck at anything other than performing basic mathematical operations; basically they can only add, subtract and basic stuff like that.
Quantum computing is more for crunching large numbers quickly.
Chips that simulate how brain cells work are far better than either of those two.
2)The field of Ai programming that is making strides lately is reverse engineering how the brain works cause you already have a basis to work off of; Ai like Skynet are making next to no advances because they're theoretically incapable of creatively coming up with solutions.


To expand upon this here's some other things:
Due to physics it's much easier to physically transfer information than it is to digitally transfer it.  To use a analogy let's say you need to use a terabyte of data on your work computer; which is easier?  Uploading it online and then downloading it or physically taking a external hard drive to your work computer?  It's a physical limitation that would take a long time for me to explain, but basically physically transferring data takes less time.



If you put all this together what it means is that when we have human level intelligence Ai they will be based off how the human brain works computer wise, will programming wise mimic how the human mind works and will pretty much have to have physical bodies because of limitation of data transfer.

It would be possible to transfer Ai digitally, but it would probably be a last resort.  A Ai would more than likely when switching to a new platform would probably physically transfer their data storage device containing their Ai to their new body then switch over to their new body.  A Ai transferring themselves through the internet would be a last ditch, "Oh shit!" resort if no other means of transfer were present.
